0df992566217d5cbf2953fdeb2d63b3a2c0a17c8.query:
INSERT INTO users (id, slack_id, name, email, img_url)
    VALUES($1,$2,$3,$4,$5)
    ON CONFLICT (slack_id)
        DO UPDATE
        SET img_url = EXCLUDED.img_url;

13204ebbc5bfff0333e10082829f8de546f10b2d.query:
SELECT slack_id, name, email, img_url
        FROM users;

15ad2e14f9ebfe89ec3a4b59e03e18bb0dc19b1f.query:
SELECT slack_id, name, email, img_url
        FROM users
        WHERE lower(name) = $1
        LIMIT 1;

17e465839b16cfe389bdd3d027304bd804dbebfb.query:
SELECT ao, date
        FROM back_blasts
        WHERE bb_type = 'backblast' AND active = true AND date >= $1
        ORDER BY date DESC;

1c4419d889e0f690ce69708d2dab386b76411a72.query:
WITH list_view AS (
            SELECT
                al.name as ao,
                string_to_array(lower(qlu.qs), ',') as qs,
                qlu.date,
                qlu.closed
            FROM q_line_up qlu
                INNER JOIN ao_list al on qlu.channel_id = al.channel_id
        )
        
        SELECT ao, qs as "qs!", date, closed
        FROM list_view
        WHERE ao = $1 AND date BETWEEN $2 AND $3
        ORDER BY date ASC;

286f1afdaeb32bc417262c2dbbdb58d71de6586a.query:
INSERT INTO ao_list (id, name, days, channel_id, active)
    VALUES($1,$2,$3,$4,$5)
    ON CONFLICT (name)
    DO NOTHING;

3ab37473cd0da75beac4784d59a3d988b5977a29.query:
INSERT INTO q_line_up (id, qs, ao, date, closed, channel_id)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)
        ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT q_line_up_channel_id_date_key
            DO NOTHING;

43bdd8d1d5e1769c5ae142f6a8c6b7fb75796713.query:
WITH list_view AS (
        SELECT
            al.name as ao,
            string_to_array(lower(q), ',') as q,
            string_to_array(lower(pax), ',') as pax,
            date,
            bb_type,
            bb.channel_id
        FROM back_blasts bb
        INNER JOIN ao_list al on bb.channel_id = al.channel_id
        WHERE bb.bb_type = 'backblast' AND bb.active = true
    )
    
    SELECT ao, channel_id, q as "q!", pax as "pax!", date, bb_type
    FROM list_view 
    WHERE pax @> array[$1]
    ORDER BY date DESC;

5440d790b55d5a56da30748d2a8b9a3db44e5673.query:
WITH list_view AS (
            SELECT
                al.name as ao,
                string_to_array(lower(qlu.qs), ',') as qs,
                qlu.date,
                qlu.closed
            FROM q_line_up qlu
                INNER JOIN ao_list al on qlu.channel_id = al.channel_id
            WHERE al.channel_id = $2
        )
        
    SELECT ao, qs as "qs!", date, closed
    FROM list_view
    WHERE date = $1;

5cf289ade009ec58c12553de995194456c268caa.query:
WITH list_view AS (
        SELECT
            al.name as ao,
            string_to_array(lower(q), ',') as q,
            string_to_array(lower(pax), ',') as pax,
            date,
            bb_type,
            bb.channel_id
        FROM back_blasts bb
        INNER JOIN ao_list al on bb.channel_id = al.channel_id
        WHERE bb.bb_type = 'backblast' AND bb.active = true
    )
    
    SELECT ao, channel_id, q as "q!", pax as "pax!", date, bb_type
    FROM list_view 
    WHERE pax @> array[$1]
    ORDER BY date DESC
    LIMIT 1;

b21ec7dcab3d13ccf2f3ffe5893016e00f001e5b.query:
WITH list_view AS (
            SELECT
                al.name as ao,
                string_to_array(lower(qlu.qs), ',') as qs,
                qlu.date,
                qlu.closed
            FROM q_line_up qlu
                INNER JOIN ao_list al on qlu.channel_id = al.channel_id
        )
        
        SELECT ao, qs as "qs!", date, closed
        FROM list_view
        WHERE date BETWEEN $1 AND $2
        ORDER BY date ASC;

c7e186250ede869eba2642f1bc59fe9f03625879.query:
WITH list_view AS (
        SELECT
            al.name as ao,
            string_to_array(lower(q), ',') as q,
            string_to_array(lower(pax), ',') as pax,
            date,
            bb_type,
            bb.channel_id
        FROM back_blasts bb
        INNER JOIN ao_list al on bb.channel_id = al.channel_id
        WHERE bb.bb_type = 'backblast' AND bb.active = true
    )
    
    SELECT ao, channel_id, q as "q!", pax as "pax!", date, bb_type
    FROM list_view 
    ORDER BY date DESC;

c96b95bed930c3742df897b3ce93451468abe46e.query:
WITH list_view AS (
        SELECT
            al.name as ao,
            string_to_array(lower(q), ',') as q,
            string_to_array(lower(pax), ',') as pax,
            date,
            bb_type,
            bb.channel_id
        FROM back_blasts bb
        INNER JOIN ao_list al on bb.channel_id = al.channel_id
        WHERE bb.bb_type = 'backblast' AND bb.active = true AND bb.date >= $1 AND bb.date <= $2
    )
    
    SELECT ao, channel_id, q as "q!", pax as "pax!", date, bb_type
    FROM list_view 
    ORDER BY date DESC;

d821e3fd93247e6c85dc55a3ea0239c6901220c0.query:
INSERT INTO back_blasts (id, ao, q, pax, date, bb_type, channel_id, active)
    VALUES($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8)
    ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT back_blasts_channel_id_date_bb_type_key
        DO NOTHING;

e1dd009d9ce0e2e636ad19696f2e811b34740154.query:
INSERT INTO users (id, slack_id, name, email, img_url)
    VALUES($1,$2,$3,$4,$5)
    ON CONFLICT (slack_id)
        DO UPDATE
        SET name = EXCLUDED.name,
            img_url = EXCLUDED.img_url;

e9752807b9ea1b74716a9c860e4a5fa31a543dfe.query:
WITH list_view AS (
        SELECT
            al.name as ao,
            string_to_array(lower(q), ',') as q,
            string_to_array(lower(pax), ',') as pax,
            date,
            bb_type,
            bb.channel_id
        FROM back_blasts bb
        INNER JOIN ao_list al on bb.channel_id = al.channel_id
        WHERE bb.bb_type = 'backblast' AND bb.active = true AND bb.channel_id = $1
    )
    
    SELECT ao, channel_id, q as "q!", pax as "pax!", date, bb_type
    FROM list_view 
    ORDER BY date DESC;
